---
title: "Table Templates"
author: Devin J. Cornell
---


In this example, I show how to use a table template to create your schemas. This is as simple as creating a table schema that inherits from one of the built-in template classes. 


```{python}

import sys
sys.path.append('..')
import doctable
import glob
```



```{python}
@doctable.table_schema
class MyTab(doctable.IDColTemplate, doctable.AddedColTemplate, doctable.UpdatedColTemplate):
    a: int = doctable.Column()
    s: str = doctable.Column()

doctable.inspect_schema(MyTab).column_info_df()
```
